column3: Gensokyo is isolated from the Outside World.

column3: A scarlet fog covers the skies of Gensokyo.
column5: Alternate title: Reimu visits the Western mansion in Yamate-cho, Yokohama, and bonks some people.

column3: A remote shrine is set up on top of Youkai Mountain.
column5: Alternate title: Reimu pays a visit to the local shrine and bonks some gods and tengu in the process.

column3: A localized earthquake destroys the Hakurei Shrine.
column5: Alternate title: Reimu interrupts her daily routine (?) to go to heaven and bonk a celestial. And an oarfish apparently.
Alternate title: Reimu actually travels more than 380,000 km to the Moon in what seems like 30-40 minutes, and also bonks bnuuys and other Lunarians in the process.

column3: The ninth child of Miare is expected to die.
column5: Honestly, never thought she would climb to 39th place during this year's Popularity Vote.
